mapper.insert: insert into mergant (u_id, m_name, m_tel, location, opentime, closetime, r_id, type, boss_name, boss_tel) values (#{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opentime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{closetime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{rId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bossTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mergant set m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_tel = #{mTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opentime = #{opentime,jdbcType=TIME}, closetime = #{closetime,jdbcType=TIME}, r_id = #{rId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, boss_name = #{bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boss_tel = #{bossTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_price = #{addPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, min_price = #{minPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u_id, m_name, m_tel, location, opentime, closetime, r_id, type, boss_name, boss_tel, create_time, update_time,min_price,add_price from mergant where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select u_id, m_name, m_tel, location, opentime, closetime, r_id, type, boss_name, boss_tel, mergant.create_time, mergant.update_time,min_price,add_price from mergant LEFT JOIN account A on mergant.u_id = A.id LEFT JOIN region G on mergant.r_id = G.id where A.REMOVED = '0'
AND m_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
Order By update_time DESC
